mata danena aakarayata age amma ayata pilukulaki.eyata hethuwada ma dani.ee dariyata sellam karannata duwa paninnata..kolam karannata kisidu awakashayak nodena age mawa noyek werawiriya damamin hadanne duwa shishyathwaya pas karawannataya.age chuti duwa danata yanneda janapriya pasalakataya.eheth age mawata aya kolambaa ho nuwara yawimata awasi wi atha.mawpiyan mese thama dudaruwangen wibhaga sandaha paliganna awastha ma kothekuth daka atha.shishyathwaya yanu in pradhanama ekaki.mada shishyathwaya samathwi wenath pasalata giya kenekmi.mata mathaka athi paridi ma shishyathwa panthi giye sathi deka thunaki.eya ese wuye mage wu hithuwakkara kamataya.shishyathwa panthiyata ekala rupiyal panahak masayata gani.rupiyal panahak masayata ayakala panthiya wenath pothak gannata rupiyal ekasiya wisipahak illiya.matada ee mudala gedarin illuwanam nodi arinne natha.eheth mage athipanditha kamata panthi oone na dan thiyena skole hodayi kiya sitimi.samanyan sama wishayakatama lakunu 90 ta wadi lakunu thibu ma pasupasa etharam noduwana mage mawpiyo da etharam shishyathwa panthiyakata yawimata warawayam nokaleya.
